step.origin: SELECT fecha AS fecha, '${OLD_INTRADAY_ID}' AS intradiario, cm, pt, ct, f, val AS valor FROM estimacion_garantias WHERE id_sesion = '${SESSION_ID}' AND tipo_de_escenario = 'HISTORICO' AND cuenta = 'CORRIENTE' AND t = 3 AND (scm IS DISTINCT FROM 'DE' OR (ct NOTNULL AND f NOTNULL)) -- Niveles AND ( -- is_nivel_cclv_pt(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_sistema_pt(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_scm_pt(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_cm_pt(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_cclv_cl(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_sistema_cl(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_scm_cl(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_cm_cl(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_ct1(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- OR is_nivel_ct2(NULL, sistema, scm, cm, pt, NULL, ct, f) -- ) ORDER BY sistema ASC NULLS FIRST, scm ASC NULLS FIRST, cm ASC NULLS FIRST, pt ASC NULLS FIRST, ct ASC NULLS FIRST, f ASC NULLS FIRST
